itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down the latest SCOTUS ruling on the First Amendment and what it means for free speech at public schools, John McAfee's suicide in prison, Spotify and Apple and how long it will take before the two companies go into a full podcasting arms race, and Tim Cook threatening Nancy Pelosi about the tech anti-trust laws being put before the House.
